snippet: The Baseball Writers’ Association of America permanently stripped Le Batard of his Hall of Fame vote for handing his ballot to Deadspin as a prank.
abstract: Baseball Writers’ Association of America permanently strips Dan Le Batard of his Hall of Fame vote for handing his ballot to website Deadspin as a prank designed to mock the voting process; Le Batard is a freelance columnist for The Miami Herald and the host of television and radio programs for ESPN, his full-time employer.
lead_paragraph: The Baseball Writers’ Association of America permanently stripped Le Batard of his Hall of Fame vote for handing his ballot to Deadspin as a prank.

headline.main: No More Hall of Fame Votes for Dan Le Batard
headline.print_headline: No More Hall Votes for Le Batard
